member.name: T:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacInstanceContext
member.summary: Manages instance lifecycle using an Autofac inner container.

remarks.para: This instance context extension creates a child lifetime scope based on a scope provided and resolves service instances from that child scope.
When this instance context is disposed, the lifetime scope it creates (which contains the resolved service instance) is also disposed.

member.name: M:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacInstanceContext.#ctor(Autofac.ILifetimeScope)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The outer container/lifetime scope from which the instance scope will be created.

member.summary: Finalizes an instance of the class.

member.summary: Enables an extension object to find out when it has been aggregated. Called when the extension is added to the property.
member.param: The extensible object that aggregates this extension.

member.name: M:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacInstanceContext.Detach(System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext)
member.summary: Enables an object to find out when it is no longer aggregated. Called when an extension is removed from the property.
member.param: The extensible object that aggregates this extension.

member.summary: Handles disposal of managed and unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacInstanceContext.Current
member.summary: Gets the current for the operation.
member.value: The associated with the current if one exists; or if there isn't one.

member.name: T:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacServiceHostFactory
member.summary: Creates instances for WCF.

member.name: T:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacHostFactory
member.summary: Creates service host instances for WCF.

remarks.para: The Autofac service host factory allows you to change the strategy by which service implementations are resolved. You do this by setting the with a strategy implementation.
If is a new instance of will be used.
You may configure additional behaviors or other aspects of generated service instances by setting the . If this value is not , generated host instances will be run through that action.

member.name: M:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacHostFactory.CreateServiceHost(System.String,System.Uri[])
member.summary: Creates a with specific base addresses and initializes it with specified data.
member.param: The initialization data passed to the instance being constructed by the factory.
The of type that contains the base addresses for the service hosted.

remarks.para: If is not , the new service host instance is run through the configuration action prior to being returned. This allows you to programmatically configure behaviors or other aspects of the host.

member.name: M:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacHostFactory.CreateSingletonServiceHost(System.Object,System.Uri[])
member.summary: Creates a for a specified type of service with a specific base address.
member.param: Specifies the singleton service instance to host.
The of type that contains the base addresses for the service hosted.
member.returns: A for the singleton service instance specified with a specific base address.

member.name: P:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacHostFactory.Container
member.summary: Gets or sets the container or lifetime scope from which service instances will be retrieved.
member.value: An that will be used to resolve service implementation instances.

member.name: P:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacHostFactory.HostConfigurationAction
member.summary: Gets or sets an action that can be used to programmatically configure service host instances this factory generates.
member.value: An that can be used to configure service host instances that this factory creates. This action can be used to add behaviors or otherwise modify the host before it gets returned by the factory.

member.summary: Gets or sets the service implementation data strategy.

member.name: P:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.AutofacHostFactoryResources.ImplementationTypeUnknown
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Service '{0}' is registered in such a way that its implementation type could not be derived. This is required for WCF integration. member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The service '{0}' configured for WCF is not registered with the Autofac container..

member.name: T:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.DefaultServiceImplementationDataProvider
member.summary: Simple resolver for WCF service implementations. Allows for single-tenant handling of named or typed services.

member.name: T:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.IServiceImplementationDataProvider
member.summary: Defines a strategy for resolving which service type should be used for hosting vs. which type is the actual service implementation.

member.name: M:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.IServiceImplementationDataProvider.GetServiceImplementationData(System.String)
member.summary: Gets data about a service implementation.
member.param: The constructor string passed in to the service host factory that is used to determine which type to host/use as a service implementation.
member.returns: A object containing information about which type to use in the service host and how to resolve the implementation.

member.name: M:Autofac.Integration.Wcf.DefaultServiceImplementationDataProvider.GetServiceImplementationData(System.String)
member.summary: Gets data about a service implementation.
member.param: The constructor string passed in to the service host factory that is used to determine which type to host/use as a service implementation.
member.returns: A object containing information about which type to use in the service host and which type to use to resolve the implementation.

remarks.para: This resolver takes the constructor string stored in the .svc file and resolves a matching keyed or typed service from the root application container. That resolved type is used both for the service host as well as the implementation type.

member.summary: Gets or sets a mechanism that allows the to get the actual implementation for a service.
